welcome_message_body: Welcome to Udipi, a charming coastal town known for its beautiful beaches, ancient temples, and delicious South Indian cuisine. We invite you to explore our city and immerse yourself in the unique cultural experiences it has to offer. Enjoy your time here!

restaurants.address: Hotel Rukmini Residency, Near City Bus Stand (State Highway 37), Udupi 576101, Karnātaka
